body.name: Fairy Tales Rosemary Repel Daily Kids Conditioner– Kids Like the Smell, Lice Do Not, 32 fl oz. (Pack of 1)

features: Rosemary Repel Conditioner is used wet hair to condition and detangle, the added bonus is that the formula contains essential oils that kids love the smell of, lice do not.
In lab studies, our proprietary blend of rosemary, citronella, tea tree, geranium and peppermint oils also help defend against unwanted visitors.
Jojoba, Chamomile and Lavender extracts hydrate, moisturize and soothe the scalp.
Gentle enough for everyday use. No harsh chemicals or toxins.
Sulfate-free, paraben free, phthalate free, gluten free, soy free, dairy free and nut free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best conditioner to prevent lice
reviews.reviewText: We love fairy tales rosemary lice prevention products. Amazing smell . We use this conditioner and the detangling rosemary spray everyday. Never had any issues and never never had lice. This stuff works great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Helps with tangles and keeping hair soft. Has a good smell. We get it to help prevent lice. My son has longer hair and I work at a school.I recommend the bigger bottle of conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTLEY LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
reviews.reviewText: ABSOLUTLEY LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! I USE THE SHAMPOO AND CONDITIONER ON MY 6 YEAR OLD. THIS BRAND IS EFFECTIVE IN LICE REPELLING, CLEANSES WELL, IS GENTLE, SMELLS GREAT AND THE CONDITIONER MAKES HER HAIR REALLY SOFT AND TANGLE FREE WITHOUT ANY BUILDUP! MY DAUGHTER'S HAIR IS REALLY FINE AND BREAKS EASILY IF WE BRUSH TOO MUCH BUT WE DONT HAVE TO DO THAT WHEN WE USE THIS CONDITIONER. ITS PRICIER THAN OTHER BRANDS BUT WELL WORTH IT! I WILL KEEP PURCHASING!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product came highly recommended to us when our son started school and got lice for the first time within the first 2 weeks of school hes now been in that school for 3 years and no problem since we started using this shampoo and conditioner thank you fairy tails for excellence in keeping those nasty little things away from hair! I highly recommend buying this and using it every day for your child while they are in school especially in elementary or preschool or day care because you never know and in the meantime they can easily catch lice anytime but this stuff works at preventing it from ever happening I will constantly keep using it on him. And he does not mind the scent or anything it's overall very pleasant!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is really nice, and everyone in the house is using this ...
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: When purchased in 10/2018 both the shampoo and the conditioner came with pumps!!! Thank you so much for adding these. They are great and help tremendously with the bottles being so big and little hands. The only sad thing is I purchased pumps when I ordered because I knew we'd need them so now we have extra. Oh well, it was still a nice jester on the company's part. Thanks again!!ORIGINAL:We found out that a cousin that was at our house playing had head lice, a few days after the fact. We did a preventative Rid treatment (against my preference because of all the chemicals) because I did not want to deal with head lice in our home. Everyone was treated with Rid, we checked every other day with combs, then did a second treatment and thankfully, haven’t seen a thing. I purchased these for daily use throughout the school year. Having a false alarm scare was all I needed to know that head lice is really not something I want to deal with. The smell is really nice, and everyone in the house is using this with the shampoo. Hopefully it really will work well!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The conditionor is good and we haven't had any issues. It has a strong smell and it doesn't smell great but cheaper than treating for lice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it and so do the kids
reviews.reviewText: Works great and the kids like how it smells and so do I

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective lice prevention products!
reviews.reviewText: I started using the Fairy Tales products when my kids were in preschool - they both have a lot of hair and I wanted to avoid lice if at all possible. We used the shampoo, conditioner and leave in conditioner for years. I ran out and took for granted that maybe it was a placebo, so I didn’t reorder...and then BOOM - both of my kids got lice. Super lice! We couldn’t get rid of them with Nix or Rid. They just wouldn’t die. We used the Fairy Tales lice treatment on an almost daily basis, and it saved us - we didn’t have to use poison on the kids (that wasn’t killing the lice anyway). With diligence, we were able to finally get rid of them. And we placed an auto subscription for the shampoo, conditioner and leave in conditioner so we would never run out. Prevention is the easiest way to get rid of lice! Super lice are a crazy pain to get rid of. Save yourself some (or lots! of) aggravation and use the preventative products to keep your sanity and keep lice away. I highly recommend the Fairy Tales line of products - they work, AND smell good!
